title: Drama Arts Education Design Utilizing Well-Made Digital Textbooks

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary physical expression skills and understanding of stage movement
context.additional_context: Theater arts-integrated educational program for fostering creativity among working professionals. Establishes a practice-centered learning environment using digital tools.

learning_goals: Learners can perform three or more creative pantomime movements by applying the principles of the Well-Mime technique.
Learners can successfully complete 80% or more of practical assignments by receiving peer evaluations using the digital textbook (Ku Pantomim app).
Learners can present two or more creative problem-solving cases applying theatrical arts techniques to administrative/management roles.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
